uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache

Interface INamedOperationCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNamedOperationCache, NamedOperationJCSCache

    public interface INamedOperationCache
    A generic wrapper for a cache object that adds Named operations to it. This should be implemented and injected into the Handlers: GetAllNamedOperationsHandler AddNamedOperationHandler, DeleteNamedOperationHandler, NamedOperationHandler The cache is then assigned through the OperationsDeclarations.json file. There is an example in the resources folder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • addNamedOperation

        void addNamedOperation(NamedOperationDetail operation,
                       boolean overWrite,
                       User user)
                throws CacheOperationFailedException
        Adds or updates, depending on the overwrite flag, a NamedOperationDetail to a cache. This should be implemented With appropriate methods, depending on the type of cache used and access restrictions applied.
        Parameters:
        operation - The NamedOperationDetail to store.
        overWrite - Flag relating to whether to add or overwrite a NamedOperationDetail.
        user - The user calling the operation. If overwrite is set, it should be used for checking permissions. Otherwise, it can be set to null.
        Throws:
        CacheOperationFailedException - Exception thrown when the NamedOperationDetail is not added.

      • deleteNamedOperation

        void deleteNamedOperation(String name,
                          User user)
                   throws CacheOperationFailedException
        Deletes a NamedOperationDetail from the cache.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the NamedOperationDetail a user would like to delete
        user - A User object that can optionally be used for checking permissions
        Throws:
        CacheOperationFailedException - exception thrown when the NamedOperationDetail could not be deleted

      • getNamedOperation

        NamedOperationDetail getNamedOperation(String name,
                                       User user)
                                throws CacheOperationFailedException
        Gets a NamedOperationDetail from the cache.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the NamedOperationDetail held in the cache.
        user - The User object that can optionally be used for checking permissions.
        Returns:
        A NamedOperationDetail corresponding to the name given if one exists in the Cache.
        Throws:
        CacheOperationFailedException - exception thrown when the NamedOperationDetail couldn't be retrieved.

      • getAllNamedOperations

        CloseableIterable<NamedOperationDetail> getAllNamedOperations(User user)
        Gets all the NamedOperationDetail that a user has the permission to execute.
        Parameters:
        user - The user making the request
        Returns:
        a closeable iterable of NamedOperations that a given user can execute

      • clear

        void clear()
    throws CacheOperationFailedException
        Clears all keys and values from the Cache
        Throws:
        CacheOperationFailedException - Exception thrown if the cache fails to clear
